'''''Vinyar Tengwar 2''''' is the second issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|1|3}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Halls of the Elven-king" — Tom Loback
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Evidence of Grammatical Gender in the Quenya of the '[[A Secret Vice|Secret Vice]]' Poems, and Present Thoughts on Past Tenses" — Patrick H. Wynne
* "An Elvish Astronomical Catalog" — Jorge Quiñónez
* "A Linguistic Review of J.R.R. Tolkien's ''[[The Return of the Shadow]]''" — Jorge Quiñónez
